summary: The save game file of Avelline Martell, a beautiful breton, from just after entering the keep in Helgen
descriptionHtml:
.....:: Avelline Martell ::.....

Avelline is a beautiful, young breton woman who has quickly become my favorite character. The save file provided is from Helgen, shortly after entering the keep. No mods are required, though I strongly recommend you install one of the mods available on this nexus that fixes the bumpiness and lines on female faces. I\'ve listed a couple below, but feel free to pick your own.

UPDATE, 11/19: Uploaded a corrected .ess - if you downloaded Avelline before 11/19, please download the new file.

.............................
Recommended:
- Xenius\' No More Blocky Faces:
(( http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=30 ))
- Windsong\'s Female Press Out The Wrinkles and Forehead:
(( http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=124 ))
.............................
Credits:
- Xenius
- Windsong
- Bethesda for Skyrim!
author: siempre
